articles.description: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has been fined £7500 for documenting the moment the Gabon squad were held at Banjul Airport in Gambia for more than six hours overnight.
articles.content:
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has been fined £7500 for sharing a series of social media posts that tarnished the 'honour and image' of the Confederation of African Football.
